notes: It's the fourth floor boss. Use his body to get a random reward before you use the body of Evil Mastermind, otherwise you may not get any item.
abilities: {{Ability List| {{Melee|0-120|element=physical}}|{{Ability|[[Blood|Blood Bomb]]|12-20|element=death}}|{{Ability|[[Sudden Death]]|0-30 Hits physical}}|{{Ability|[[Death Damage|Great Sudden Death Beam]]|20-30|element=death}}|{{Healing}}|{{Ability|Sudden Death Bomb Summon|1-2 [[Demon Skeleton]]s|element=summon}} }}
sounds: Since you didn't eat your spinach Bogey comes to get you!
Too bad you did not eat your lunch, now I have to punish you!
Even if you beat me, I'll hide in your closet until you one day drop your guard!
You better had believe in me!
I'll take you into the darkness ... forever!
name: Boogey
